q: Budget Committee Chairman Paul Ryan ( R-WI) said that the GOP's goal was to cut`` a good$ 100 billion.'' We can live with that. `` We've got to roll back there. That will save$ 100 billion in the first year,'' agreed Mike Pence ( R-IN).
